endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: debug

param_schema.title: Debug
param_schema.description: Print out compute/inference times and memory usage information

parameters.description: Print out compute/inference times and memory usage information

parameters.name: language

param_schema.title: Language
param_schema.description: ISO code of the language spoken in the audio, specify None to perform language detection

parameters.description: ISO code of the language spoken in the audio, specify None to perform language detection

parameters.name: align_output

param_schema.title: Align Output
param_schema.description: Aligns whisper output to get accurate word-level timestamps

parameters.description: Aligns whisper output to get accurate word-level timestamps

parameters.name: max_speakers

param_schema.title: Max Speakers
param_schema.description: Maximum number of speakers if diarization is activated (leave blank if unknown)

parameters.description: Maximum number of speakers if diarization is activated (leave blank if unknown)

parameters.name: min_speakers

param_schema.title: Min Speakers
param_schema.description: Minimum number of speakers if diarization is activated (leave blank if unknown)

parameters.description: Minimum number of speakers if diarization is activated (leave blank if unknown)

parameters.name: initial_prompt

param_schema.title: Initial Prompt
param_schema.description: Optional text to provide as a prompt for the first window

parameters.description: Optional text to provide as a prompt for the first window

parameters.name: huggingface_access_token

param_schema.title: Huggingface Access Token
param_schema.description: To enable diarization, please enter your HuggingFace token (read). You need to accept the user agreement for the models specified in the README.

parameters.description: To enable diarization, please enter your HuggingFace token (read). You need to accept the user agreement for the models specified in the README.

parameters.name: language_detection_min_prob

param_schema.title: Language Detection Min Prob
param_schema.description: If language is not specified, then the language will be detected recursively on different parts of the file until it reaches the given probability

parameters.description: If language is not specified, then the language will be detected recursively on different parts of the file until it reaches the given probability

parameters.name: language_detection_max_tries

param_schema.title: Language Detection Max Tries
param_schema.description: If language is not specified, then the language will be detected following the logic of language_detection_min_prob parameter, but will stop after the given max retries. If max retries is reached, the most probable language is kept.

parameters.description: If language is not specified, then the language will be detected following the logic of language_detection_min_prob parameter, but will stop after the given max retries. If max retries is reached, the most probable language is kept.

endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model (idempotent creation).
